name: Now it's my turn
description:
In this Classic Turn RPG game, for an unknown reason, the monster begins to attack your village.

They destroy everything you have, now you want revenge.

Explore the world, fight with many different monsters, collect items when traveling, get experience in combat.

Fulfill your revenge wish.

Game Features

- Inspired in JRPG games
- Classic turn combats
- Level up your characters and increase their powers
- Get new magic over time
- Anime characters inspiration
